summary:
Your Keys. Your Crypto. - Move your crypto out of exchanges and into the self-custody smart wallet that earns you money.

 Decentralized finance (DeFi) is revolutionizing the future of financial services - With the right tools, like Giddy, you can put your crypto to work and earn passive income on the blockchain.

 Grow Your Crypto: DeFi Made Easy - With Giddy, you get access to DeFi protocols that let you be a lender (and earn like one too).

 Time the Market? Be the Market. - Put your crypto to work in DeFi instead where you can earn 10x or more the U.S. national deposit rate.

 The Word Is Getting Out - "Giddy focuses on democratizing the most sophisticated strategies of wealth building in crypto that are typically dominated by high net worth investors."

 You’re in Good Company - Smoothest experience in DeFi. This app takes you from novice to DeFi pro in minutes, explaining each step along the way.
